issue.title: [CF 1098] No timer text
issue.body:
Hi,

I'm using TMW 7.2.5.
I'm trying to set up simply cooldown check on spells, but I cant see any text timer, as I set up.
I dont use any elvui or omnicc.
Disabled any other addons, still nothing.

Please help


> Posted by CurseForge user gervazy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1098 | Raw

comments.body:
You either need OmniCC installed, or you need to enable Blizzard's timer text in Blizzard's interface options (ActionBars category).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yes, turning on Blizzard's timer text helped!

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user gervazy
